channel.title: Jamie Andrew on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Jamie Andrew on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: ISBA 2016: No limits - Jamie Andrew
item.description: DM - Donald Macleod JA - Jamie Andrew DM We keep climbing up. So, we’re delighted to be able to welcome Jamie Andrew. He’s going to inspire us I’m sure, and challenge us to look at the barriers that get in the way of progress and to believe in the influence we can exert individually and collectively to achieve our goal. So, as I said earlier, you’re joy-givers, you’re hope-givers, you’re the people who make a huge difference.
